name: Hell's Dishes #LD49
description:
This is my LudumDare #49 COMPO entry
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/hells-dishes

In this game you are tasked to pick up all the plates and bring them back to the dishwasher :)

An easy task it would seem, but how really is it? Find out :)

To pick up the plates you need to be close to the table and then wait!

Balance your way back to the dishwasher!

I hope you don't break too many dishes :P

CONTROLS:

- WASD or ARROR KEYS to move

- MOVE MOUSE to look around

- TAB or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON for the mini map

- LEFT SHIFT or RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to walk slowly

The web version is slow on bigger maps, desktop versions work better there :)

I wasn't able to test if the osx version works, if anyone could check and give me info it would be really cool :)

Tools used:

- Godot 3.3.4

- Blender 2.83.5

- Krita

- A few textures from opengameart.org

- Font from fontlibrary.org
